snippet: Republicans picked up a governor’s office in North Carolina on Tuesday, adding to a streak of gains in recent elections that has given the party a strong majority in state capitals.
abstract: Republicans picked up governor’s office in North Carolina, adding to a streak of gains in recent elections that has given party a strong majority in state capitals.
lead_paragraph: Republicans picked up a governor’s office in North Carolina on Tuesday, adding to a streak of gains in recent elections that has given the party a strong majority in state capitals.

headline.main: New Inroad for G.O.P. as Democrats Lose Statehouse in South
headline.print_headline: New Inroad for G.O.P. As Democrats Lose Statehouse in South
